Array: Three islands, one rod each. Once they're out, we can dock at Maelstrom Point and take the fight to Stormcaller!
While sailing, hold <button=Boat_Accelerate> to move forward, and <button=MoveHorizontal> to steer the ship.
The <color=magic>Map</color> can be opened by pressing <button=UI_PingHud>. It shows your current location, as well as your objective.
No go, chief! Gotta get rid ov the rods on all three islands first!
The crystals are powering this thing. We can probably use the graplou to break them.
